dcterms:description: A dataset of manually-labelled acceleration signals gathered from seven patients undergoing treatment for tuberculosis (TB), compiled for experimentation in bed-occupancy detection and cough monitoring.
dcterms:title: Manually-labelled acceleration signals from patients

dcterms:description: ELAN annotated accelerometer magnitude signals used for manual annotation of captured acceleration signals to provide accurate ground truth labels for bed occupancy.
dcterms:title: ELAN annotated accelerometer magnitude signals

dcterms:description: A cough detection dataset from previous work that was utilized in the development of the cough monitoring system.

dcterms:description: A dataset that captures cough frequency dynamics in adults undergoing treatment for pulmonary tuberculosis, used to correlate cough rates with treatment effectiveness.

dcterms:description: A dataset containing colony forming unit (CFU) and time to positivity (TPP) values used for monitoring tuberculosis treatment response.
dcterms:title: TB treatment monitoring dataset (CFU and TTP values)
